Greta Thunberg je líderkou našich čias, DiCaprio ju nazval aj budíčkom pre svetových lídrov
02 Nov 2019, 14:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Slávny hollywoodsky herec Leonardo DiCaprio považuje švédsku ekologickú aktivistku Gretu Thunberg za „líderku našich čias„. Napísal to vo svojom piatkovom poste na Instagrame, ktorý zverejnil po stretnutí s Gretou. „História nás bude súdiť podľa toho, čo spravíme dnes pre to, aby sme zaistili, že aj budúce generácie budú môcť žiť na takej istej obývateľnej planéte, akú sme my tak bezstarostne považovali za samozrejmosť. Dúfam, že to, čo Greta hovorí, bude budíčkom pre lídrov po celom svete, ktorý ich presvedčí, že čas nečinnosti sa skončil,“ napísal DiCaprio.
„Vďaka Grete a mladým aktivistom po celom svete som optimistický pri pomyslení na budúcnosť,“ uviedol herec, ktorý je sám bojovníkom proti nečinnosti vlád tvárou v tvár klimatickej kríze.
„Bolo mi cťou stráviť čas s Gretou. Sľúbili sme si, že sa budeme navzájom podporovať v nádeji, že sa podarí zaistiť našej planéte svetlejšiu budúcnosť,“ napísal DiCaprio.
Informácie pochádzajú z webstránky britského denníku The Guardian a z instagramového účtu Leonarda DiCapria.
View this post on Instagram There are few times in human history where voices are amplified at such pivotal moments and in such transformational ways – but @GretaThunberg has become a leader of our time. History will judge us for what we do today to help guarantee that future generations can enjoy the same livable planet that we have so clearly taken for granted. I hope that Greta’s message is a wake-up call to world leaders everywhere that the time for inaction is over. It is because of Greta, and young activists everywhere that I am optimistic about what the future holds. It was an honor to spend time with Greta. She and I have made a commitment to support one another, in hopes of securing a brighter future for our planet. #FridaysforFuture #ClimateStrike @fridaysforfuture A post shared by Leonardo DiCaprio (@leonardodicaprio) on Nov 1, 2019 at 10:22am PDT

text:
Greta Thunberg is the leader of our times, DiCaprio called it a wake-up call for world leaders
02 Nov 2019, 14:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Famous Hollywood actor Leonardo DiCaprio considers Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg as "leader of our times". He wrote this in his Friday post at Instagram, which he published after meeting with Greta. “History will judge us according to what we do today to make sure that future generations can live on the same habitable planet that we so carelessly take for granted. I hope that what Greta says will be a wake-up call for leaders around the world convincing them that the time of inactivity is over, ”wrote DiCaprio.
"Thanks to Grete and young activists around the world, I am optimistic about the future," said the actor, who himself is a warrior against government inaction in the face of a climate crisis.
“It was an honor to spend time with Greta. We promised to support each other in the hope that our planet will be brighter, ”wrote DiCaprio.
The information comes from the website of the British newspaper The Guardian and from the instagram account of Leonardo DiCaprio.
